featured.text: As such, the dot signifies piety and serves as a constant reminder to keep God in the front of a believer’s thoughts.
The shocking pictures include images of smoke-damaged lungs and teeth, with reminders in large print that smokers die younger.

definition.zh_def: 提醒，通知某人注意某事的行為或工具。
definition.en_def: A message or signal that serves to remind someone of something.
definition.example: I set a reminder on my phone to pick up groceries later.
